task.title: Using Font-face
task.shortdesc: The predominant method of rendering fonts on your site is going to useful for any designer to understand.

taskbody.prereq: Have a style sheet set up either inside or outside of your HTML document.

step.cmd: Choose how many attributes you want connected to the @font-face element in the style sheet.
Write @font-face into the style sheet and list the font-family followed by src: the.url/you/are/pulling.from
List any further attributes you would like to use with that font.
Set the value of each of those attributes.
Make sure to include in the font-face section of the CSS which default Generic Family the selected font should revert to.
